alert.note: Alert for Penobscot (Maine) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued May 22 at 7:31PM EDT until May 22 at 10:00PM EDT by NWS Caribou
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 745 PM EDT FOR SOUTH CENTRAL PENOBSCOT COUNTY... At 731 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Winterport, or 10 miles west of Bucksport, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor hail damage to vehicles is possible. Expect wind damage to trees and power lines. Locations impacted include... Hampden, Orrington and Newburgh. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
